issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports expanding affordable healthcare access, protecting pre-existing condition coverage, and lowering prescription drug costs

issues.title: Infrastructure Investment
issues.description: Advocates for major infrastructure spending to repair roads, bridges, and modernize transportation systems

issues.title: Gun Control
issues.description: Supports universal background checks and restrictions on assault weapon sales

issues.title: Climate Change Action
issues.description: Supports green energy initiatives, reducing carbon emissions, and investing in renewable energy infrastructure

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Advocates for increased federal education funding, student debt relief, and expanded access to higher education

issues.title: Reproductive Rights
issues.description: Strong supporter of abortion access and women's reproductive healthcare rights

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform with pathway to citizenship for undocumented immigrants
